Header: South Korean president says strong military will ensure peace
Content: South Korean President Moon Jae-in said on that a strong military will ensure peace on the 70th anniversary of the country’s Armed Forces Day at an event held at the War Memorial of Korea. The event included military displays and a musical performance by South Korean rapper, Psy. This was a clear contrast to last year’s ceremony, which included a military parade and a showcasing of ballistic missiles. The announcement comes the same day as troops from North and South Korea began removing some landmines along their heavily fortified border in a pact to reduce tension and build trust on the divided peninsula.
